data.title: Korg: 1D local thermodynamic equilibrium stellar spectral synthesis
data.name: Korg.jl
data.description: 1D LTE stellar spectral synthesis in pure Julia

evidence: README indicates network usage: "See the [documentation for `synth`](https://ajwheeler.github.io/Korg.jl/stable/API/#Korg.synth), or [the documentation for `synthesize`](https://ajwheeler.github.io/Korg.jl/stable/API/#Korg.synthesize"
"Korg is a package for computing stellar spectra from 1D model atmospheres and linelists assuming local thermodynamic equilibrium. It can be used with Julia or Python."
Example shows `using Korg` and Python `from juliacall import Main as jl` ... `Korg.synth(...)`, indicating it is imported as a library/package dependency.
